channel.title: Best Staker?
channel.description:
I wanna make a dueler to try and make some money back after i got scammed my purple phat.
What would be the best for dueling only?
Attack - Strength - Defense - Ranged - Prayer - Magic - Hitpoints -
Im thinking I would do soemthing like this, but idk:
Attack - 95 Strength - 99 Defense - 45 Ranged - 1 Prayer - 1 Magic - 1 Hitpoints - a lot

item.description:
@lax_mikel wrote:

i agree with u

Read full topic

item.title: Best Staker?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

@fellixombc and Kaza, I don’t like those builds too much, I think im going wit hthe other people said, soemthing like this:

Attack - 90
Strength - 99
Defense - 90
Ranged - 99
Prayer - 1
Magic - 94
Hitpoints - 99

Of course, im not goign to get all those 99 skills too fast, but I think this would be a good build for a dueler.

Tip.It says this would only be combat lvl 108 and that sounds great, although Ide still love advice from people on how to make it better.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Staker?
item.dc:creator: @1337h4x 1337h4x
item.description:
@1337h4x wrote:

[quote=“Rune Hacker, post:9, topic:108820”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=155727.msg1470974#msg1470974 date=1181622972]
if your staking do these skills

Attack - 80
Strength - 99
Defense - 90+
Ranged - 90+
Prayer - 1
Magic - 94
Hitpoints - a lot
[/quote]
1.) WIll all those mage and range levels increase my combat lvl?
2.) Isn’t 90+ defense a little much?
3.) What lvl would this char be, like 110 or something?[/quote]

  1. No. They will just raise your hp which might raise your cb level.
  2. Stakers need the highest def possible.
  3. Use a calculator on tipit.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Staker?
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

well want me to find out? ill calc also this is saying you alched and stuff (no hp for magic) and you didnt pc for range or str or anything…

umm well in total you would be around 104 cmb… but if you pced you would be under 100 closer to 100 cmb then before

item.title: Best Staker?
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

Ooo Java, the people i will be staking will most likely have 80+ str and wit htha thig hof str, i dotn think def makes much of a difference, i could be wrong though. And if I had 99 str, I dont think them having a high def would make much a difference anyways lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Staker?
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:2, topic:108820”]mmmm… “Kids Ranqe” I think it was had these stats for pking though, they might help:

Attack - 99
Strength - 99
Defense - 1
Ranged - 1
Prayer - 52
Magic - 1
Hitpoints - a lot

They would own , but i think they had some range and magic levels as well…[/quote]
Not for staking.

80 attack
85 str
99 def
82+ mage
1 pray
70+ range
99 defence, no one will hit. 85 strength, you can hit 25+ with whip.
No need for prayer. if your not touching wilderness.
